title: Flippy Cat Wear
summary: Wear Games. on your watch, flippy cat is a fun addictive game for android wear.

Simply tap to control flippy cat and guide him through the pipes. Make sure not to get hit or you'll have to start over!Earn medals and try to get the best score you can. descriptionHTML:
This is the paid version of Flippy Cat, enabling users to donate to the developer.

Flippy cat is a fun game for android wear. Featuring addictive gameplay. Simply tap to control flippy cat and guide him through the pipes. Make sure not to get hit or you'll have to start over!
Earn medals and try to get the best score you can. Flippy cat is a great time killer. See if you can beat your highscore. Featuring cute graphics, this android wear game will give you hours of fun.

The game features an achievements screen showing all of your medals and the current highscore.

Compatible with Moto 360, Moto 360 2, Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G, Urbane and R watch, Samsung Gear, Asus Zenwatch and many more.

FEATURES COMING SOON:

* More medals
* Online Scoreboard

We welcome your suggestions!

Email any queries in regards to this app to callan102@gmail.com
comments: Game Really get great app but I can't believe Flappy Bird was so popular it's a horrible game.
